path.style: fill: rgb(128, 101, 196); stroke: rgb(84, 89, 110); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px;

circle.style: fill: rgb(255, 213, 120); stroke: rgb(84, 89, 110); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px;
fill: rgb(255, 213, 120); stroke: rgb(84, 89, 110); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px;

rect.style: fill: rgb(255, 213, 120); stroke: rgb(84, 89, 110); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px;

path.style: fill: rgb(255, 213, 120); stroke: rgb(84, 89, 110); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px;
fill: rgb(84, 89, 110); stroke: rgb(84, 89, 110); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px;
fill: rgb(255, 243, 95); stroke: rgb(84, 89, 110); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px;
fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke: rgb(84, 89, 110); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px;
